articles.author: Aya Elamroussi, CNN
articles.title: These states and cities are offering to pay kids if they get vaccinated - CNN
articles.description: Millions of children in America became eligible to receive the Covid-19 vaccine this week. And some officials are sweetening the deal by including them in various incentive programs.
articles.content:

articles.title: Kim Kardashian still my wife, says Ye amid ongoing divorce - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: American rapper, Ye, formerly known as Kanye West, has stated that reality TV star, Kim Kardashian is still his wife, despite their ongoing divorce.
articles.content:
